extensionAttribute.displayName: Time Machine - Show Status in Menu Bar
extensionAttribute.description: This attribute displays whether or not the Time Machine status is enabled in the menu bar. This extension attribute requires this preference be set using Managed Preferences (MCX).
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh lastUser=`last -1 -t console | awk '{print $1}'` result=`mcxquery -user $lastUser -format tab | grep dontAutoLoad | awk -F "\t" '{print $5}'` desiredResult='( "/System/Library/CoreServices/Menu Extras/TimeMachine.menu" )' if [ "$desiredResult" == "$result" ]; then echo "<result<Pass ($result)</result<" else echo "<result<Fail ($result)</result<" fi
